install.description: KontentBox for Joomla 1.5 combines the popular Lightbox and Mediabox to play all media formats, including images, MP3, WAV, YouTube, Flickr, Google Video, MetaCafe, MySpace, Revver, Seesmic, Veoh, Viddler, Vimeo, 12seconds.tv, Flash animation, FLV video, Quicktime video, and Windows Media Video. It is also supported on portable devices like the iPad.
